description: Service host needs a project to live in.
Rendering engine implementation depends on the POC's success and findings.
mitigation_plan: The POC itself is the mitigation. Contingency is to use WriteableBitmap.
impact_if_delayed: Delays entire viewer implementation by one sprint.

description: Ingestion consumer processes messages published by the SCP listener.
Login ViewModel requires the Authentication Service to function.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mocked interface initially.
